tuv.seg: Direct elections to the European Parliament are held every 5 years
Déantar toghcháin chun Parlaimint na hEorpa a reáchtáil gach 5 bliana
The first direct elections were held in 1979
Reáchtáladh na chéad toghcháin dhíreacha sa bhliain 1979
European Parliament elections take place within a 4-day period, normally in the month of June, all over the European Union
Is laistigh de thréimhse 4 lá, i lár mhí an Mheithimh de ghnáth, a bhíonn toghcháin Pharlaimint na hEorpa ar siúl ar fud an Aontais Eorpaigh
The Minister for Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government appoints a returning officer for the "polling day" and the "polling period", which must be at least 12 hours between 8.00 a.m

Ceapann an tAire Comhshaoil, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil ceann comhairimh don “lá vótaíochta” nó don “tréimhse vótaíochta”, agus ní mór an toghchán a bheith ar siúl ar feadh 12 uair ar a laghad idir 8.00 a.m
The 2014 elections take place on Friday, 23 May 2014
Beidh toghcháin na bliana 2014 ar siúl Dé hAoine an 23 Bealtaine 2014
There are 766 Members of the European Parliament (MEPs) elected by voters in 28 EU member states, since Croatia joined the EU in July 2013
Ó chuaigh an Chróit isteach san AE i mí Iúil 2013, tá 766 Feisire de Pharlaimint na hEorpa (FPE) ann, iad tofa ag vótálaithe i 28 ballstát den AE
Following on from the European Council Decision of 28 June 2013 (2013/312/EU) (pdf), after the 2014 election there will be 751MEPs
Tar éis Cinnidh ón gComhairle Eorpach an 28 Meitheamh 2013 (2013/312/AE) (pdf), beidh 751 Feisire de Pharlaimint na hEorpa tar éis thoghchán na bliana 2014
Ireland's MEP representation is reduced to 11 MEPs
Tá líon na bhFeisirí de Pharlaimint na hEorpa ó Éirinn laghdaithe go 11 duine
For the 2014 elections, Ireland is reducing the number of constituencies from 4 to 3: Dublin, which elects 3 MEPs, Midlands-North-West and South which will each elect 4 MEPs

I gcás thoghcháin na bliana 2014, tá Éire ag laghdú líon na dtoghlach ó 4 thoghlach go 3 cinn. Is iad sin, toghlach Bhaile Átha Cliath, ina dtoghfar triúr Feisirí de Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus toghlach an Láir Tíre-an Tuaiscirt-an Iarthair agus toghlach an Deiscirt, áiteanna a dtoghfar ceathrar Feisire de Pharlaimint na hEorpa
This follows the report of the European Parliament Constituencies Committee in 2013
Tagann sé sin sna sála ar thuarascáil Choimisiún Toghlach Pharlaimint na hEorpa sa bhliain 2013
Responsibility for conducting the election in each of the constituencies rests with a returning officer appointed by the Minister for Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government
Is é an ceann comhairimh arna cheapadh ag an Aire Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil atá freagrach as an toghchán a stiúradh i ngach ceann de na toghlaigh
He or she must be a County Registrar or a City or County Sheriff
Ní mór dó a bheith ina Chláraitheoirí Contae nó ina Shirriam Cathrach nó Contae
There are also local returning officers who are responsible for taking the poll from the many polling stations in each county and city
Tá oifigigh áitiúla chomhairimh ann freisin, daoine atá freagrach as an vótaíocht a thógáil ón iliomad stáisiúin vótaíochta i ngach contae agus cathair
